issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Provide access to the elements of parquet::record::{List, Map}
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10800](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10800). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When dealing with List and Map, ListAccessor and MapAccessor provide type-safe access to elements of the collections if type and position are known. For cases where that information is unavailable, providing access to the underlying Vec of Fields would be extremely beneficial.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10800?focusedCommentId=17244339) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8827
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8827>
